name: D-Parts
tagline: A Simple PHP Framework for create Webapps
body:
#Welcome to the home of D-Parts
This Framework aims to help you build web applications easily.

You can access the Git repository download:

`git :/ / github.com/devahil/dparts0.1.2-4Alpha.git`

OR see the Git Source online in:

`https://github.com/devahil/dparts0.1.2-4Alpha`

#Authors and Contributors
@devahil is the creator of this Framework, but it's an OpenSource Distro', so you can help with development.

#Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

#Fist Steps
Before to work you must configure de archive

`./core/dpcore.config.php`

The reason for doing this is mainly leg having a coherent interaction point with the database to use. An great example to restore the matrix config class:

`class coreconfig {

    /**
     * Config for the primary server database
     */
    public $server = ""; // Host for the database server
    public $user = ""; // User for the database
    public $password = ""; // Password for the database
    public $database = ""; // Database itself

    /**
     * Site Config
     */
    public $page_title = "";
    public $copyright = "";
    public $docs_dir = "";
    public $dev_dir = "";
    public $framework_dir = "core"; //Don't change
    public $logo = "../shared/images/logo.png"; //Just an example
    public $host = ""; // IP or Domain for AJAX or another things to use
    public $templates = "../templates";

}`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
